channel.title: Birds on Muza's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Birds on Muza's Blog

item.title: fly away
item.description: My Soul wants to fly away when your presence calls it so sweetly. My Soul want to take flight, when you whisper “Arise”. -rumi

item.title: happiness
item.description: when you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you; a joy. -rumi

item.title: I Choose To Love You
item.description: “I choose to love you in silence… For in silence I find no rejection, I choose to love you in loneliness… For in loneliness no one owns you but me, I choose to adore you from a distance… For distance will shield me from pain, I choose to kiss you in the wind… For the wind is gentler than my lips, I choose to hold you in my dreams… For in my dreams, you have no end.

item.title: My First Bird
item.description: i believe i can. i will.
